Holiday: Maundy Thursday (most regions except Catalonia, Valencia)
Easter Monday (Basque Country, Catalonia, La Rioja, Navarre, Valencia)
End of World War II (Berlin only)
Saint John the Baptist Day (Catalonia, Valencia)
Feast of Saint James (Basque Country, Galicia, Madrid, Navarre)
Day of Our Lady of Africa (Ceuta)
